alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 5:05AM EDT until July 29 at 1:25AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...From this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Moderate flooding. Evacuation of homes begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this morning to 30.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening to 22.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 22.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.6 feet on 12/31/1942. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM this morning.
